items.name: FL Studio 21
items.guide: Install FL Studio, run as administrator, and follow the activation instructions included in the download.

items.name: Serum VST
items.guide: Extract the VST file to your plugins folder. Typical locations: C:\Program Files\VSTPlugins or C:\Program Files\Steinberg\VSTPlugins

items.name: Omnisphere 2
items.description: Flagship synthesizer with vast sound library
items.guide: Run the installer, select your DAW's VST folder, and use the provided keymaker to activate.
